turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Transamerican Love Story.
turn.1: What is the show Transamerican Love Story about?
turn.2: Transamerican Love Story Transamerican Love Story is an American reality dating show in which suitors woo transgender woman Calpernia Addams.
turn.4: Addams chooses a suitor by process of elimination.
turn.6: When the show first aired, viewers could vote their preferences online, but it was Addams who chose whom to eliminate.
turn.7: What other people were on the show?
turn.8: Calpernia is accompanied by her friend Andrea James; each episode is hosted by comedian Alec Mapa.
turn.9: What was the most interesting thing about the show?
turn.10: "Transamerican Love Story" is the first reality dating show in the United States in which contestants compete for the attention and approval of a transgender woman.
turn.12: Logo TV, a digital cable channel with LGBT content, announced the series in November 2007, and premiered the first episode the following February.
